personalInfo.name: Ahmed Oublihi
personalInfo.title: Software Developer
personalInfo.summary: I'm a Software Developer based in Bremen, Germany. I dive deep into JavaScript and love crafting sleek, efficient web apps. With an eye for detail and a hunger for learning, I'm all about delivering high-quality solutions that meet both user needs and business objectives.

experience.description: Developing responsive web applications using React.js and Next.js. Collaborating with clients to understand requirements and deliver high-quality solutions. Implementing modern UI/UX designs and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.

Worked on developing and maintaining web applications using React.js and Next.js. Collaborated with the backend team to integrate APIs and improve user experience. Implemented responsive designs and optimized application performance.

education.description: Focused on web development technologies, software engineering principles, and computer science fundamentals. Participated in various coding projects and hackathons.

Completed an intensive program focusing on advanced React concepts, state management with Redux, and building complex user interfaces. Developed several projects showcasing proficiency in React ecosystem.

Completed a comprehensive curriculum covering both frontend and backend technologies. Earned certifications in Responsive Web Design, JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures, and Frontend Libraries.

projects.name: SpeedFleet
projects.description: A web application for car rental companies to manage their fleet and bookings. Implemented real-time updates and an intuitive booking system.

projects.name: Quran Tafsir
projects.description: A comprehensive web application providing Quran translations and interpretations in multiple languages. Features include search functionality and audio recitations.

projects.name: NextChat
projects.description: A real-time chat application built with Next.js and Socket.io. Includes features like private messaging, group chats, and message encryption.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Includes a blog section and contact form.
